mapper.insert: insert into user_auths (auth_id, user_id, login_type, identifier, password, open_id, login_first_time, login_first_end, login_first_ip, login_end_ip, user_status) values (#{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginFirstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginFirstEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginFirstIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginEndIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_auths set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_type = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identifier = #{identifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_first_time = #{loginFirstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_first_end = #{loginFirstEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_first_ip = #{loginFirstIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_end_ip = #{loginEndIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select auth_id, user_id, login_type, identifier, password, open_id, login_first_time, login_first_end, login_first_ip, login_end_ip, user_status from user_auths where auth_id = #{authId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
